description:
"What would you say is the best thing about your body?"
"I would have to say my chest," Derek said.
I would have to agree... Derek's chest is massive! He's a big guy at 6'3" and just muscles all over!
He's 26 and says he might settle down some day, but for now he's fine with having fun.
"Nothing complicated," he said when asked what he looks for in a girl. "My life is already complicated..."
I bet the girls love that big dick of his!
title: Derek
